flixel.system.input.keyboard.FlxKeyboard

type
class
implements
flixel.system.input.IFlxInput
Keeps track of what keys are pressed and how with handy Bools or strings.

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

enabled : Bool

Whether or not keyboard input is currently enabled.

justPressed : Dynamic

Check to see if a key, or one key from a list of mutliple keys was just pressed. See FlxG.keys for the key names, pass them in as Strings. Example: FlxG.keyboard.justPressed("UP", "W", "SPACE")

justReleased : Dynamic

Check to see if a key, or one key from a list of mutliple keys was just released. See FlxG.keys for the key names, pass them in as Strings. Example: FlxG.keyboard.justReleased("UP", "W", "SPACE")

pressed : Dynamic

Check to see if a key, or one key from a list of mutliple keys is pressed. See FlxG.keys for the key names, pass them in as Strings. Example: FlxG.keyboard.pressed("UP", "W", "SPACE")

Instance Methods

inline anyJustPressed(KeyArray : Array<Dynamic>) : Bool

parameters
KeyArray An array of keys as Strings
returns
Whether at least one of the keys passed was just pressed.
Check to see if at least one key from an array of keys was just pressed. See FlxG.keys for the key names, pass them in as Strings. Example: FlxG.keyboard.anyJustPressed("UP", "W", "SPACE")

inline anyJustReleased(KeyArray : Array<Dynamic>) : Bool

parameters
KeyArray An array of keys as Strings
returns
Whether at least one of the keys passed was just released.
Check to see if at least one key from an array of keys was just released. See FlxG.keys for the key names, pass them in as Strings. Example: FlxG.keyboard.anyJustReleased("UP", "W", "SPACE")

inline anyPressed(KeyArray : Array<Dynamic>) : Bool

parameters
KeyArray An array of keys as Strings
returns
Whether at least one of the keys passed in is pressed.
Check to see if at least one key from an array of keys is pressed. See FlxG.keys for the key names, pass them in as Strings. Example: FlxG.keyboard.anyPressed("UP", "W", "SPACE")

destroy() : Void

Clean up memory.

getIsDown() : Array<FlxKey>

returns
Array of keys that are currently pressed.
Get an Array of FlxMapObjects that are in a pressed state

inline getKeyCode(KeyName : String) : Int

parameters
KeyName The String name of the key.
returns
The key code for that key.
Look up the key code for any given string name of the key or button.

inline onFocus() : Void

inline onFocusLost() : Void

playback(Record : Array<flixel.system.replay.CodeValuePair>) : Void

parameters
Record Array of data about key states.
Part of the keystroke recording system. Takes data about key presses and sets it into array.

record() : Array<flixel.system.replay.CodeValuePair>

returns
An array of key state data. Null if there is no data.
If any keys are not "released" (0), this function will return an array indicating which keys are pressed and what state they are in.

reset() : Void

Resets all the keys.

inline toString() : String

update() : Void

Updates the key states (for tracking just pressed, just released, etc).
